original_title: The Dollyrots: Family Vacation-Live in Los Angeles
overview: The Dollyrots' first live concert film: Live in Los Angeles captures the exuberant duo in top form on a 2015 tour of the USA, with their toddler son along for the adventure & in support of a catalog spanning 15 years and 5 albums. From a single special concert performance filmed at the World-famous Roxy in their hometown of Los Angeles in Sep 2015.
title: The Dollyrots: Family Vacation-Live in Los Angeles
